name: nl.netherlands3d
description: A library of Unity3D systems/prefabs meant for reuse/addition that were initialy developed for 3D Amsterdam and 3D Utrecht.

samples.description: Example of a search input field which can be used to search for an address in a selected city
Example of a camera based on the one used in 3DAmsterdam and 3DUtrecht, with dragging, scroll zooming etc.
Example of showing pdok.nl BAG information in a canvas after clicking on buildings
For importing files.
For importing OBJ-files.
Template example of how to use the minimap
Example for selecting areas using pointer
Example showing the profile rendering tool and the DXF or SVG exporting of selected profiles.
Example of a Directional Light with shadows based on the position of the sun according to the location,date and time.
Example showing filtering out subobjects based on a buildyear slider
CityJSON visualizer, gets a CityJSON building from a BAGID, visualises it, allows for annotations, and resumbits it to be registered
Basic TileSystem
3DTiles tile system example
Ready to use timeline UI prefab
Ready to use traffic example
Web Service Reader to read WMS' and WFS' from urls
Runtime tooling for correct wms-url's for use in the WMS-Layer
A system that allows you to create snapshots independent of you screen resolution, with or without UI
A WebGL template example to use for Netherlands3D WebGL projects with unityInstance reference and responsive full browser window behaviour.
A simple message system to quickly put up message on screen through code.
